content.title: Khiladi Protsahan Yojana
content.beneficiary: Registered construction workers or their family members
content.details: The Khilaadee Protsaahan Yojana, a scheme of the Madhya Pradesh Building Department under the Labor Department, provides financial assistance to registered construction workers or their family members under the MP Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board who have excelled in sports.
benefits: ₹10,000/- for selection at District Level (Category – A)
₹5,000/- for being winner at District Level (Category – B)
₹25,000/- for selection at Division Level (Category – A)
₹15,000/- for being winner at Division Level (Category – B)
₹25,000/- for selection at State Level (Category – A)
₹30,000/- for being winner at State Level (Category – B)
eligibility: The applicant should be a native of Madhya Pradesh.
Family members registered under MP Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board.
The applicant should have a bank account.
content.application_process: Applications must be submitted in the prescribed format, along with a certificate issued by the District Superintendent of Police or the District Sports Officer through a recognized sports organization, to the designated officer. For urban areas: Commissioner/Chief Municipal Officer, Urban Local Body.
documents_required: Application form in the prescribed format along with a copy of the registration card
Certificate given by the District Superintendent of Police and District Sports Officer through the sports organization
Construction workers and their family members holding valid identity cards
The Aadhaar Card of the applicant

faqs.question: What is the purpose of this scheme?
faqs.answer: To provide incentives to construction workers or their family members registered under MP Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board for their excellent performance in sports.

faqs.question: Is this scheme only for rural areas?
faqs.answer: No, this is applicable to urban and rural both.

faqs.question: Is there any time limit for applicants?
faqs.answer: Up to 06 months after winning the qualifying sports competition.

faqs.question: Is there any offline process in Application?
faqs.answer: It is necessary to submit the application in the prescribed format and time limit at the office of the designated officer.

faqs.question: Who will get the benefits of this scheme?
faqs.answer: Construction workers and their family members.

faqs.question: What is the financial eligibility criteria?
faqs.answer: There will be no restriction on income for the beneficiary to get assistance under the scheme.
